      Parameters:
      board - a copy of the game board

      public void setDoubleSelection​(boolean doubleSelection)
      Parameters:

    • removeHighlight

      public void removeHighlight()

    • disablePoseidonBuild

      public void disablePoseidonBuild​(java.util.Collection<Tile.IndexTile> tilesToChoose)
      changes the behavior of tiles buttons back to default after the user performed a build operation with Poseidon
      Parameters:
      tilesToChoose - tiles that were valid when the user performed a build operation using Poseidon's power

    • enablePoseidonBuild

      public void enablePoseidonBuild​(java.util.Collection<Tile.IndexTile> tilesToChoose)
      changes the behavior of valid tiles in order to perform a build operation with Poseidon
      Parameters:
      tilesToChoose - tiles the user can select to perform a build operation with Poseidon
      See Also:
      Poseidon
